lines.text: Wait! A snake in my tub, will you?

Killing him is not the answer. If you want to turn their guts to water, you're gonna have to come up with something special. Their blasted missionary's turned them into 'God-Save-Us' Christians... cramming their woolly heads with empty words like equality, justice and mercy.

[she slaps him]
His only begotten son... Crucify the bastard!
No white man gets whipped on Blackmoor... unless I do it. How can you keep that rabble in line when you fight amongst yourselves? Whip him!
Because I say so. You show those other slaves you're no mollycoddle or you're not worth a farthing round here
If you can't do the job
